randoop

Class JunitFileWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • randoop.JunitFileWriter

  • public class JunitFileWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    JunitFileWriter is a class that for a collection of sequences, outputs Java files containing one JUnit4 test method per sequence. An object manages the information for a suite of tests (name, package, and directory) and is used by first running writeJUnitTestFiles and then writeSuiteFile or writeDriverFile. Alternatively, a single test file can be written using the static method writeJUnitTestFile.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JunitFileWriter

        public JunitFileWriter(java.lang.String junitDirName,
                       java.lang.String packageName,
                       java.lang.String masterTestClassName)
        JunitFileWriter creates an instance of class holding information needed to write a test suite.
        Parameters:
        junitDirName - directory where files are to be written
        packageName - package name to be used in JUnit test classes
        masterTestClassName - name of test class suite/driver

    • Method Detail

      • writeJUnitTestFile

        public static java.io.File writeJUnitTestFile(java.lang.String junitOutputDir,
                                              java.lang.String packageName,
                                              ExecutableSequence es,
                                              java.lang.String className)
        writeJUnitTestFile is a static method that writes a single test class to the specified directory and with the specified class name.
        Parameters:
        junitOutputDir - directory where files are to be written.
        packageName - package name for test classes.
        es - executable sequence to be written to test class.
        className - name of test class.
        Returns:
        the File that new test class was written to

      • writeJUnitTestFiles

        public java.util.List<java.io.File> writeJUnitTestFiles(java.util.List<java.util.List<ExecutableSequence>> seqPartition)
        writeJUnitTestFiles writes a suite of test class files from a list of lists of executable sequences. Each executable sequence corresponds to a test method, a list of executable sequences corresponds to a test class, and the list of lists to a test suite.
        Parameters:
        seqPartition - suite of test classes as a list of lists of executable sequences
        Returns:
        list of File objects corresponding to test class files generated.
        See Also:
        writeSuiteFile(java.util.List<java.lang.String>), writeDriverFile()

      • writeSuiteFile

        public java.io.File writeSuiteFile(java.util.List<java.lang.String> additionalTestClassNames)
        Writes a JUnit4 suite consisting of test classes from writeJUnitTestFiles(List) and additional classes provided as a parameter. The file is written to the directory pointed to by writer object in a class whose name is the masterTestClassName.
        Parameters:
        additionalTestClassNames - a list of class names to be added to suite.
        Returns:
        File object for test suite file.

      • writeDriverFile

        public java.io.File writeDriverFile()
        writeDriverFile writes non-reflective driver for tests as a main class. The file is written to the directory pointed to by writer object in a class whose name is the masterTestClassName.
        Returns:
        File object for generated Java file.

      • indent

        public static java.lang.String indent(java.lang.String codeString)
